T04sanss17u:6: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā |
T04sanss17u:9: varṇavān rūpasaṃpanno lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ sthāmnā balena côpeto nâsau kausīdyam ṛcchati āḍhyo mahādhanaś câsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api |
T04sanss17u:12: bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī ||
T04sanss17u:16: rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ ||
T04sanss17u:17: ścyuta/ câsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane |
T04sanss17u:19: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ |
T04sanss17u:20: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam ||
T04sanss17u:22: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ |
T04sanss17u:23: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate ||
T04sanss17u:26: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā |
T04sanss17u:27: yaś cêha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam ||
T04sanss17u:29: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ |
T04sanss17u:30: tasyêha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ ||
T04sanss17u:32: vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam ||
T04sanss17u:37: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ |
T04sanss17u:38: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān ||
T04sanss17u:41: satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca ||
T04sanss17u:42: cakravartī ca rājâsau śakraś ca bhavatîśvaraḥ |
T04sanss17u:43: brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca ||
T04sanss17u:45: sarve 'syârthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ ||
T04sanss17u:46: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatrôpapadyate |
T04sanss17u:49: priyaḥ sadayitaś câsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ |
T04sanss17u:50: davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ ||
T04sanss17u:52: te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca ||
T04sanss17u:54: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu |
T04sanss17u:55: tasyânuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca
T04sanss17u:56: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ |
T04sanss17u:57: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya ||
T04sanss17u:58: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahânubhāvo vidu cakravartī |
T04sanss17u:59: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke ||
T04sanss17u:62: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ |
T04sanss17u:63: tasyêha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ |
T04sanss17u:66: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ ||
T04sanss17u:67: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke |
T04sanss17u:68: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye
T04sanss17u:69: ||suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ |
T04sanss17u:71: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ ||
T04sanss17u:72: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa |
T04sanss17u:73: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati anantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ |
T04sanss17u:74: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sadâpramattaḥ |
T04sanss17u:75: na tasyâgniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya ||
T04sanss17u:77: adho upādāya ca vibhavâgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ |
T04sanss17u:78: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriyâivarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayatâika dīpam ||
T04sanss17u:79: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitâṅgo dṛḍhâsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī |
T04sanss17u:80: ālokaprāpto [[DOUBT]] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu
T04sanss17u:81: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ |
T04sanss17u:82: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam
T04sanss17u:83: ||alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu |
T04sanss17u:84: tasyêha bhoty asadṛśâtmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ ||
T04sanss17u:85: yebhir jinasya pratapatâtmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [[DOUBT]]
T04sanss17u:91: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca ||
T04sanss17u:93: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ
T04sanss17u:95: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit |
T04sanss17u:96: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datvêha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu ||
T04sanss17u:97: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti |
T04sanss17u:98: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarâṅgu tasyâvikala viśuddha bhoti
T04sanss17u:99: ||viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ |
T04sanss17u:100: ghraṇêndriyaṃ paramôttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||jihvâsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā |
T04sanss17u:101: raktā pravālā yathariva [[DOUBT]] devatānāṃ svarâṅga koṭīvara sṛjate
T04sanss17u:103: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nâpi ca nāmitâṅgaḥ |
T04sanss17u:107: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahôrago vā |
T04sanss17u:108: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanss17u:109: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditâṅgaḥ |
T04sanss17u:110: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya
T04sanss17u:112: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya |
T04sanss17u:113: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya
T04sanss17u:114: ||pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe |
T04sanss17u:115: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhânulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe
T04sanss17u:117: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanss17u:118: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke 'rthaṃ sahasrā tulayati nô cireṇa |
T04sanss17u:119: karoti cârthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanss17u:120: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca |
T04sanss17u:122: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe
T04sanss17u:123: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ |
T04sanss17u:124: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanss17u:126: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś câsya viśiṣṭa bhonti |
T04sanss17u:127: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanss17u:128: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti |
T04sanss17u:129: naiṣkramyaprāptau câdīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanss17u:130: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca |
T04sanss17u:131: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanss17u:132: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñâbhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam |viśālaprajño
T04sanss17u:133: viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanss17u:134: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān |
T04sanss17u:142: na tasya rājâpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye ||kumārga
T04sanss17u:143: sarvaṃ pithitâpāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ |
T04sanss17u:144: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ ||śokāṃś
T04sanss17u:145: ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty anekān |
T04sanss17u:146: āśvāsaprāptaś cânantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye ||
T04sanss17u:148: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye ||
T04sanss17u:149: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā |
T04sanss17u:150: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ ||yaḥ
T04sanss17u:151: prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke |
T04sanss17u:152: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ ||
T04sanss17u:153: tasyêha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devâsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca |
T04sanss17u:154: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśêśvarāṃś ca ||
T04sanss17u:155: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne |
T04sanss17u:156: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti câiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham ||
T04sanss17u:160: asya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ |
T04sanss17u:161: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadâbhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ ||
T04sanss17u:162: paricāra bhoty asya svarâṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo |
T04sanss17u:163: na tasya kaścij janayati cêśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya |
T04sanss17u:165: ākruṣṭaḥ san nâjanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ ||devêndra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā |
T04sanss17u:166: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatîha stūpaṃ ||
T04sanss17u:167: nâsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke |
T04sanss17u:168: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam ||
T04sanss17u:169: sūtrântacaryā na kadācid asya nâsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke |
T04sanss17u:170: satvāś ca tṛptā muditâsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ ||
T04sanss17u:173: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti ||
T04sanss17u:174: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nâsya bhonti atulyatâptaś ca susaṃsthitâṅgaḥ |
T04sanss17u:175: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān |
T04sanss17u:176: iti ||āryamahākaruṇāpuṇḍarīkasūtre 'py uktaṃ |tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt
T04sanss17u:177: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalama-treṣu dhātuṣu |
T04sanss17u:179: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ |
T04sanss17u:180: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyântaśâikapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti |
T04sanss17u:181: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān anādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate
T04sanss17u:182: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ |
T04sanss17u:185: saced antaśaḥ svapnântaragatâpi satvā buddham ālambyâkāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmîti ||uktaṃ
T04sanss17u:187: aṣṭābhir bhujagâdhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante |
T04sanss17u:194: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti |
T04sanss17u:203: kiṃ punar darśanaṃ sarvakāṅkṣācchedanam uttamam ||sudṛṣṭo lokapradyotaḥ sarvadharmagatiṃ gataḥ
T04sanss17u:205: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ |
T04sanss17u:208: na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihârāgito jinaḥ ||vipulaṃ jāyate cittaṃ paśyatāṃ dvipadôttamaṃ
T04sanss17u:209: prajñābalam asaṃkhyeyaṃ jāyate ca prabhāsvaraṃ ||punar atrâivâha |
T04sanss17u:217: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca ||kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate
T04sanss17u:221: saṃbhavaty avatāraś ca jñāne saṃbuddhagocare ||kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narôttamam
T04sanss17u:222: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae |
T04sanss17u:225: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ |api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ |
T04sanss17u:226: kiṃ punaḥ svarūpeṇa || uktaṃ hy āryaśraddhābalâdhānâvatāramudrāsūtre |
T04sanss17u:227: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajôpamānāṃ
T04sanss17u:228: pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi |
T04sanss17u:230: yaś cânyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed |
T04sanss17u:232: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād |
T04sanss17u:235: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti |
T04sanss17u:250: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikalêti ||
T04sanss17u:252: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena
T04sanss17u:254: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ |
T04sanss17u:256: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet ||atrâivôktaṃ
T04sanss17u:257: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ
T04sanss17u:258: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekâikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā |
T04sanss17u:259: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet |
T04sanss17u:260: yaś câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvâdīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet
T04sanss17u:261: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti |
T04sanss17u:262: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti |
T04sanss17u:264: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃ-
T04sanss17u:266: ghaṃ sarvasukhôpadhānaiḥ satkuryuḥ yaś câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta |
T04sanss17u:267: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahârghataraṃ ca |
T04sanss17u:268: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ
T04sanss17u:269: yac câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād |
T04sanss17u:270: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati |
T04sanss17u:271: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet
T04sanss17u:272: yac câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśâikapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet |
T04sanss17u:273: asya dānasyâitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti |
T04sanss17u:277: caturêmān bhadrânuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati |
T04sanss17u:279: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati
T04sanss17u:282: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss17u:283: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss17u:284: imāś catvāraḥ iti ||idaṃ ca niruttaraṃ tathāgatapūjôpasthānaṃ
T04sanss17u:290: yac ca satveṣu mahākaruṇācittam utpādayatîti ||nirdiṣṭam apy āryaratnameghe |
T04sanss17u:291: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvânanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante |
T04sanss17u:301: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sâmiṣeṇa |
T04sanss17u:304: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti |
T04sanss17u:306: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhir dharmair iti ||anumodanânuśaṃsās tv āryaprajñāpāramitāyām uktāḥ |
T04sanss17u:307: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittôtpādān anumodate |caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittôtpādān
T04sanss17u:309: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ |
T04sanss17u:311: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ||
T04sanss17u:312: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat |
T04sanss17u:314: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palâgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ |
T04sanss17u:315: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittôtpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ ||evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat |
T04sanss17u:317: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittôtpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
T04sanss17u:320: bodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti
T04sanss17u:322: mārapakṣikās te bhagavan satvā bhaviṣyanti ||bhagavān āha |
T04sanss17u:324: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cême cittôtpādânumoditā
T04sanss17u:325: bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā |
T04sanss17u:326: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti || bhagavān āha ||evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittôtpādakuśalamūlair yatra
T04sanss17u:327: yatrôpapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś cârcitāś câpacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti |
T04sanss17u:330: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣûpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargôpapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā |
T04sanss17u:332: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhâvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyâprameyâsaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyantîti ||punar
T04sanss17u:336: dīvālikôpameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās te sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prati-
T04sanss17u:338: ṣṭhāya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran |
T04sanss17u:339: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayôpāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītâtītânāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ |
T04sanss17u:341: 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetâgrayânumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayôttarayā
T04sanss17u:345: pūrvakâupalambhikānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyâbhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣada-
T04sanss17u:346: m api na kṣamatae iti ||ayam eva nayaḥ pariṇāmanāyām uktaḥ |
T04sanss17u:347: athavâgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt |
T04sanss17u:350: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsâryôgraparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyâprameyâsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyêti ||
